title: Cant self gift.
body:
I wanna do that whole Legendary snowball thing, but there is no self gift option available to me.
Its either that, or my laptop isn't showing it.

Also, my snowdown shop I got skins that I already own, which was Mafia Miss Fortune.
So why did the snowdown show me a skin that I already own?

replies.body: It finished a few days ago.
You can't gift to yourself! The only way is to make another account and then gift your other account. My explanation is quite confusing though.
